Pre-Game Insights: Dodgers manager Dave Roberts said Freddie Freeman was'still sore' on Monday and is receiving treatment, but hopes he will play in Game 3 if he can.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Freddie Freeman has a sprained right ankle and is expected to miss 4-6 weeks, but hopes to return for Game 3.
Others: Freddie Freeman is an eight-time All-Star and plays a valuable role for the Dodgers as the No. 3 hitter and first baseman.
